attributes.action: I wish to prevent the replacement  Mr A Wenger as manager of Arsenal FC.
attributes.additional_details: To prolong the +20 years service Mr Wenger has given Arsenal FC and English football, as the longest serving manager in English professional football.
attributes.background: 'In the interests of N17, South, East and West London, Manchester, Liverpool and Lincoln I hereby wish to prevent the replacement of Mr A Wenger as the manager of Arsenal FC.
